verses.verse: And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Build <WH1129> me here seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and prepare <WH3559> me here seven <WH7651> oxen <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352>.
And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> as Balaam <WH1109> had spoken <WH1696>; and Balak <WH1111> and Balaam <WH1109> offered <WH5927> on every altar <WH4196> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352>.

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Stand <WH3320> by thy burnt offering <WH5930>, and I will go <WH3212>: peradventure the LORD <WH3068> will come <WH7136> to meet <WH7125> me: and whatsoever <WH1697> he sheweth <WH7200> me I will tell <WH5046> thee. And he went <WH3212> to an high place <WH8205>. to an: or, solitary

And God <WH430> met <WH7136> Balaam <WH1109>: and he said <WH559> unto him, I have prepared <WH6186> seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and I have offered <WH5927> upon every altar <WH4196> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352>.
And the LORD <WH3068> put <WH7760> a word <WH1697> in Balaam's <WH1109> mouth <WH6310>, and said <WH559>, Return <WH7725> unto Balak <WH1111>, and thus thou shalt speak <WH1696>.
And he returned <WH7725> unto him, and, lo, he stood <WH5324> by his burnt sacrifice <WH5930>, he, and all the princes <WH8269> of Moab <WH4124>.

And he took up <WH5375> his parable <WH4912>, and said <WH559>, Balak <WH1111> the king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124> hath brought <WH5148> me from Aram <WH758>, out of the mountains <WH2042> of the east <WH6924>, saying, Come <WH3212>, curse <WH779> me Jacob <WH3290>, and come <WH3212>, defy <WH2194> Israel <WH3478>.
How <WH4100> shall I curse <WH5344>, whom God <WH410> hath not cursed <WH6895>? or how shall I defy <WH2194>, whom the LORD <WH3068> hath not defied <WH2194>?

For from the top <WH7218> of the rocks <WH6697> I see <WH7200> him, and from the hills <WH1389> I behold <WH7789> him: lo, the people <WH5971> shall dwell <WH7931> alone <WH910>, and shall not be reckoned <WH2803> among the nations <WH1471>.

Who can count <WH4487> the dust <WH6083> of Jacob <WH3290>, and the number <WH4557> of the fourth <WH7255> part of Israel <WH3478>? Let me die <WH4191> <WH5315> the death <WH4194> of the righteous <WH3477>, and let my last <WH319> end be like his! me: Heb. my soul, or, my life

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto Balaam <WH1109>, What hast thou done <WH6213> unto me? I took <WH3947> thee to curse <WH6895> mine enemies <WH341>, and, behold, thou hast blessed <WH1288> them altogether <WH1288>.
And he answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, Must I not take heed <WH8104> to speak <WH1696> that which the LORD <WH3068> hath put <WH7760> in my mouth <WH6310>?

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto him, Come <WH3212>, I pray thee, with me unto another <WH312> place <WH4725>, from whence thou mayest see <WH7200> them: thou shalt see <WH7200> but <WH657> the utmost <WH7097> part of them, and shalt not see <WH7200> them all: and curse <WH6895> me them from thence.

And he brought <WH3947> him into the field <WH7704> of Zophim <WH6839> <WH6822>, to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah <WH6449>, and built <WH1129> seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and offered <WH5927> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar <WH4196>. Pisgah: or, the hill
And he said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Stand <WH3320> here <WH3541> by thy burnt offering <WH5930>, while I meet <WH7136> the LORD yonder <WH3541>.
And the LORD <WH3068> met <WH7136> Balaam <WH1109>, and put <WH7760> a word <WH1697> in his mouth <WH6310>, and said <WH559>, Go again <WH7725> unto Balak <WH1111>, and say <WH1696> thus.

And when he came <WH935> to him, behold, he stood <WH5324> by his burnt offering <WH5930>, and the princes <WH8269> of Moab <WH4124> with him. And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto him, What hath the LORD <WH3068> spoken <WH1696>?
And he took up <WH5375> his parable <WH4912>, and said <WH559>, Rise up <WH6965>, Balak <WH1111>, and hear <WH8085>; hearken <WH238> unto me, thou son <WH1121> of Zippor <WH6834>:

God <WH410> is not a man <WH376>, that he should lie <WH3576>; neither the son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, that he should repent <WH5162>: hath he said <WH559>, and shall he not do <WH6213> it? or hath he spoken <WH1696>, and shall he not make it good <WH6965>?
Behold, I have received <WH3947> commandment to bless <WH1288>: and he hath blessed <WH1288>; and I cannot reverse <WH7725> it.

He hath not beheld <WH5027> iniquity <WH205> in Jacob <WH3290>, neither hath he seen <WH7200> perverseness <WH5999> in Israel <WH3478>: the LORD <WH3068> his God <WH430> is with him, and the shout <WH8643> of a king <WH4428> is among them.
God <WH410> brought them out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>; he hath as it were the strength <WH8443> of an unicorn <WH7214>.

Surely there is no enchantment <WH5173> against Jacob <WH3290>, neither is there any divination <WH7081> against Israel <WH3478>: according to this time <WH6256> it shall be said <WH559> of Jacob <WH3290> and of Israel <WH3478>, What hath God <WH410> wrought <WH6466>! against: or, in

Behold, the people <WH5971> shall rise up <WH6965> as a great lion <WH3833>, and lift up <WH5375> himself as a young lion <WH738>: he shall not lie down <WH7901> until he eat <WH398> of the prey <WH2964>, and drink <WH8354> the blood <WH1818> of the slain <WH2491>.
And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto Balaam <WH1109>, Neither curse <WH5344> them at all <WH6895>, nor bless <WH1288> them at all <WH1288>.
But Balaam <WH1109> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Told <WH1696> not I thee, saying <WH559>, All that the LORD <WH3068> speaketh <WH1696>, that I must do <WH6213>?

And Balak <WH1111> said <WH559> unto Balaam <WH1109>, Come <WH3212>, I pray thee, I will bring <WH3947> thee unto another <WH312> place <WH4725>; peradventure it will please <WH3474> <WH5869> God <WH430> that thou mayest curse <WH6895> me them from thence.
And Balak <WH1111> brought <WH3947> Balaam <WH1109> unto the top <WH7218> of Peor <WH6465>, that looketh <WH8259> toward <WH6440> Jeshimon <WH3452>.

And Balaam <WH1109> said <WH559> unto Balak <WH1111>, Build <WH1129> me here seven <WH7651> altars <WH4196>, and prepare <WH3559> me here seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams <WH352>.
And Balak <WH1111> did <WH6213> as Balaam <WH1109> had said <WH559>, and offered <WH5927> a bullock <WH6499> and a ram <WH352> on every altar <WH4196>.
